answers.answer: Why are you getting induce im getting induce on 26
I'm getting induced on Friday, so will let you know how it goes, I'll only be 37 weeks how far are you?

My bday is the 27th:) i was induced with my first at 39 weeks my water began leaking on its own and i was 4cm dialated but i was not having contractions... so eventually i was given pitocin... my experience  wasn't bad i think it just look longer but then again they say first babies take longer to come. I went in around 6 am and had her at 440 in the afternoon
Im getting induced on the 26th i will be 39 weeks

I'll be 38 weeks on the 27th. Getting induced because of Gestational diabetes. And that's awesome! It's my moms birthday as well! :) And 10 hours for your first baby is actually pretty quick! When I had my first, I was in labor for 12 hours, and was still told it was pretty quick for it being my first child. My OB doctor seems to think my labor will be remotely short this time around.

My OB is hoping i make it to 38 weeks he said second babies tend to come a bit earlier so we shall see. Im 32 weeks now so its getting here. Im sure everything will be fine:) congratulations just bring something to keep yourself occupied i had a tv in my room and abc family  channel was playing a harry potter marathon lol

Lol. I think there will be a tv in my room as well, so hopefully I get lucky and something good will come on! If not I will just have my husband pull up Netflix for me and I'll watch something on there haha. Anything to try to keep myself occupied

question: im getting induced on the 27th, and I would really like some stories from you other mommies that got induced as well! I'm worried about so many things, so hopefully some of you can ease my mind!
title: Induction on the 27th!
